name: Pearl Izumi Elite Escape Convertible Jacket - Women's
description: This feature-packed cycling jacket provides protection from the elements and converts to a vest when the weather improves. The Elite Escape Convertible Jacket stuffs into its own pocket for storage in your jersey, and comes with an integrated strap that lets you secure it to your frame if you prefer. A mesh panel provides some venting on those high-output rides, and a grippy silicone band at the waist keeps the jacket in place when you jump out of the saddle. Zippered front pockets give you a place to put your hands when you're off the bike, and a large zippered back pocket carries your essentials.Barrier fabric is windproof and water-resistant.Mesh panel on back provides ventilation.2-way zipper is backed with a storm flap.Sleeves zip off to convert the jacket to a vest.Large zippered back pocket and 2 zippered front pockets offer secure storage.Elastic hem and cuffs seal out drafts.Silicone gripper at waist keeps jacket from riding up.Cut close to the body to minimize flapping, with enough room for a jersey underneath.Reflective details.
